effect: Damages sleeping opposing Pokémon by 1/8 of their maximum HP at the end of each turn.
synergies: Moves that induce sleep (e.g., Dark Void, Hypnosis, Spore)
Pokémon with trapping moves (e.g., Mean Look, Block)
notes: Exclusive to Darkrai. Does not affect Pokémon with Insomnia, Vital Spirit, or Comatose. Passive damage stacks with other residual effects like poison.
